name: User selects the option to view document to be signed
scenarioId: android/RQES_R4_RP_QTSP_centric_flow_28/Access_document_to_be_signed_R4_101/accessDocumentToBeSigned:User selects the option to view document to be signed
methodName: User selects the option to view document to be signed

testSteps.description: Given the user has a valid EUDI Wallet
And the user has authenticated in the Relying Party service
Given the user is on the Relying Party service page
When the user selects the option to view the document to be signed
Then the Relying Party should present the document to the user for viewing

userStory.storyName: EUDI Wallet User Views Document in Relying Party Service
userStory.displayName: EUDI Wallet User Views Document in Relying Party Service
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User,
  I want to access a document provided by the Relying Party
  so that that I can view the details of the document to be signed.

title: User selects the option to view document to be signed
